articles.title: How HBO satire 'The White Lotus' hit uncomfortably close to home for creator Mike White - USA TODAY
articles.description: More than feelings are hurt in guest-staff skirmishes in HBO's 'The White Lotus,' Mike White's satire of the privileged elite in a Hawaiian paradise.
articles.content:
Money is the root of all satire in HBO's "The White Lotus."
